results.name: Triangle read by rows: Stirling numbers of the first kind (A008275) mod 2.
comment: Essentially also parity of Mitrinovic's triangles A049458, A049460, A051339, A051380.
reference: Das, Sajal K., Joydeep Ghosh, and Narsingh Deo. "Stirling networks: a versatile combinatorial topology for multiprocessor systems." Discrete applied mathematics 37 (1992): 119-146. See p. 122. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 20 2014
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 02 2003
ext: Edited and extended by _Henry Bottomley_, Dec 01 2003
